GameActivity
Settings
SinglePlayerOptions Fireball Shoots a simple fireball at target location. Knocks back and dies on impact with players and some spells. \nSpecial:\nThis spell gains Archetype Stacks based on how many spells you have in each slot. Fires a boomerang out that knocks enemies back substantially, dealing low damage.\nSpecial:\nLasts indefinitely until the boomerang returns to you. Can impact with multiple enemies. Shoots a projectile that intermittently shoots out smaller projectiles. Moves slowly, lasts a long time, deals low damage. Its children projectiles move fast, deal low damage and last a really short time. After a moderate cast time, casts lightning in an instant line nuke towards target location. Deals high damage and really strong knock back, at the cost of a long cast time. \nSpecial:\nCan explode certain projectiles while they are in midair dealing tonnes of damage. Hurls a slow moving, slow turning ball that will lock on to the nearest enemy and move towards it. Deals high semi-reliable damage to enemies, with a strong knockback; Really slow moving. Shoots a shadow fireball. At the same time flings out 2 fireballs in a random cone. The first fireball deals mid-high damage and knocks the enemy back, applying a small amount of Archetype stacks, whereas the other 2 do no knockback or damage, but apply a high amount of Archetype Stacks Lobs a grenade at a target location. Upon impacting with the ground, the grenade will explode dealing mid damage and high knockback based on how far from the center you are. Shoots a slow moving piercing shot. This shot deals low damage, but does not die upon hitting the enemy, meaning if you time it well it can be devastating. After a long cast time, Creates a large slow moving ball of energy that moves towards a target location. The ball deals incredible damage, but the ball can be "chipped" by hitting it with most spells. This reduces the damage it deals. Tosses some small trap mines at a particular location. They deal damage and apply stacks to enemies who walk over them. Lobs a slow moving ball of energy. After a short period, this ball becomes invisible to anyone who is moving and locks onto the nearest enemy for a short period. Projects a line from you which, if the head hits an enemy, links you to them, pulling you closer to each other for the duration; dealing low damage each second. Lets fly a ball of ice that doesnt knock back enemies, but applies a large amount of Archetype Stacks Sends a gravity field in the chosen direction. the gravity field tries to pull any people, projectiles and other things towards its center. Deals low damage per second. Doesnt die on hit. Instantly summons a meteor to the sky which will hurtle towards the target location. upon reaching the ground deals INCREDIBLE knockback and damage. Pushes an Absorb Orb towards the target location. the Orb starts small, with low damage and knockback; however if it gets hit by any spells along the way it abosrbs their size, damage and knockback. Delivers a burst of sonic energy isolated to within a small area. anything that impacts with it is sent hurtling away from it, taking damage for each second they are trapped. Bombards the target area with weak fireballs. Each ball deals low damage and low knockback. Unleashes a storm of ice balls, dealing low archetype damage for each ball, and low damage. Pops a projectile towards the target location. The projectile can bounce off of a number of enemies before it fizzles. Deals low damage and knockback Sends forth a projectile that after a short period, redirects itself towards a nearby enemy. If it impacts it deals high damage, and drains some of their health. Reapproximates the casters position to an alternative location. If it impacts with an enemy it applies Archetype Stacks to them. Generates a "Swapsiedoodle" ball which if it impacts with anything will swap the casters location with it. If it is an enemy it will apply Archetype stacks to them Throttles the caster towards a nearby location. If it impacts with another player it sends them spiralling away Throttles you about the battlefield so fast you\'d think you were being decombobulated. If you impact with any spells, you dont recieve knockback, and instead are able to go faster.YOU ARE THE JUGGERNAUT! Renders the caster invisible for a short duration. If they impact with enemies while invisible they apply Archetype stacks to them. Elevates the caster high above the battlefield, unable to be hit by spells fr a short while.I suppose its just a jump really... Boom! Creates an explosion about you that knocks back and deals high damage. Applies a moderate number of ice stacks and deals damage in an AOE around you. Shoots a simple fireball at target location. Can be upgraded for more power, and lower cooldown. Can also be upgraded by purchasing spells in each slot Shoots a simple fireball at target location.
